jathika prathipaththiyak sakas kirimakin thorawa me giwisuma balathmaka nokarana bawata pahadili prathignyawak ethumagen idiripath weyi kiyana karane sambandhayen api bohoma wimasillen innawa singappuruwa samaga shri lankawa athsan kota athi nidahas welenda giwisuma pilibanda saka sahitha karunu digin digatama mathu wemin pawathi. 2018 janawari 8 wana da janadhipathiwaraya wisin amathya mandalaya wetha idiripath karana sandeshayaka dakwenne 2017 wasare juli masayedi kabinat mandalaya ekanga wu jathika welenda prathipaththiya anuwa singappuru welenda giwisuma sakas wiya yuthu bawayi. 2018 janawari 08 wani dina darana janadhipathiwarayage lipiyata masakata pasuwa enam pebarawari 04 wana da shri lanka wanija mandalaye sabhapathi sujiwa samarawira mahatha puwathpathakata prakasha kara thibune, shri lankawa jathika welenda prathipaththiyak sandaha itha ikmanin katayuthu kala yuthu bawayi.
